categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: This Separatist headquarters was a building in the city of Crystal City on the planet of Christophsis. In 22 BBY, during the Clone Wars, it was occupied by Asajj Ventress and the Confederacy of Independent Systems. A duel also took place there, shortly after Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi and Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker came to investigate evidence of a traitor.
